question: Long March 8 Y-1, which was making news, is the flagship carrier rocket of which country?
explanation:
Long March series carrier rockets are the flagship rockets of China, operated by the China National Space Administration (CNSA).
Recently, a new carrier rocket Long March 8 Y-1 made its first flight from Hainan carrying five satellites. China is also planning to develop reusable rockets under the Long March 8 series, similar to SpaceX.
